sum_bart: Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Limited (“the Company’s”) is seeking to list on the National Stock Exchange of India Limited. The company has published a newspaper advertisement of the Postal Ballot Notice of the Company.
sum_peg: We the management of Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Limited (ABFRL) would like to inform you that the Postal Ballot Notice for the proposed amalgamation of Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Limited and Aditya Birla Retail Limited with Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Limited has been published in the newspapers of India.
